<title level="1" pfs="">[Ardissa's Porters](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1765)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Ardissa's Porters](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1765)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
cargo hook (as [light pick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=30)), [Padded Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Stumbling Snag** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Requirements** The porter is holding a cargo hook; **Trigger** An enemy within the porter's reach critically misses the porter with a melee Strike; Effect The porter moves the enemy 5 feet in a direction of the porter's choosing.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
cargo hook +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

</column>
name: Ardissa's Porters
